## PublishTransactionListInfo type

Additional information for the entries in the list of Publish Transactions.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type PublishTransactionListInfo = ListInfo & {
    ItemPath?: string;
    PublicationTargetTitle?: string;
    PublicationTitle?: string;
    PublishAction?: PublishAction;
    ScheduleTime?: string;
};
```
